result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shin
result.orig: Ba cheart go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shin
result.html: Ba cheart go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shinHe should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart go mbeaḋ sé sa ḃaile anois nó d'ḟág sé an teaċ seo uair an ċloig ó ẛinHe should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.

result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.
result.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shin

result.eng: I was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shin
result.orig: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shin
result.html: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shinI was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo ḋroim niṁneaċ ó ẛinI was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.

result.eng: You were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ga: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.orig: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.html: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ponchtml: Ḃí tú in ainm teaċt leaṫuair an ċloig ó ẛinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!

result.eng: He referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.
result.ga: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shin
result.orig: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shin
result.html: Thagair sé do chás a tharla daichead bliain ó shinHe referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.
result.ponchtml: Ṫagair sé do ċás a ṫarla daiċead bliain ó ẛinHe referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.

result.html: Tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shinThings have changed since then.
result.ponchtml: Tá cúrsaí aṫraiṫe ó ẛinThings have changed since then.

result.eng: I've had a limp since then.
result.html: Tá mé bacach ó shinI've had a limp since then.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé bacaċ ó ẛinI've had a limp since then.

result.eng: My husband died two years ago.
result.ga: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.orig: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.html: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shinMy husband died two years ago.
result.ponchtml: Fuair m'ḟear céile bás ḋá ḃliain ó ẛinMy husband died two years ago.

result.eng: This is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ga: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.orig: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.html: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ponchtml: Is é seo an ċéad uair go ḃfuil mise agus mo ċlann ar saoire le ċéile ó ẛinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.

result.eng: I hurt my neck a few months ago.
result.ga: Ghortaigh mé mo mhuineál cúpla mí ó shin
result.orig: Ghortaigh mé mo mhuineál cúpla mí ó shin
result.html: Ghortaigh mé mo mhuineál cúpla mí ó shinI hurt my neck a few months ago.
result.ponchtml: Ġortaiġ mé mo ṁuineál cúpla mí ó ẛinI hurt my neck a few months ago.

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.orig: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.html: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart don ċoṁlaċt seo a ċur in iúl dúinn sé ṁí ó ẛinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.orig: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.html: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiteann sin amaċ ċoṁ minic anois agus a ṫitfeaḋ blianta beaga ó ẛinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.

result.eng: The next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ga: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.orig: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.html: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág na coṁarsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó ẛinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.

result.eng: Some ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ga: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.orig: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.html: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ponchtml: Beagnaċ deiċ mbliana ó ẛin d'éiriġ mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.

result.eng: But that was not the end of the story.
result.ga: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.orig: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.html: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.
result.ponchtml: Aċ níorḃ ẛin é deireaḋ an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.

result.eng: My daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ga: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.orig: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.html: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ponchtml: Meaḃrú laeṫúil ó ẛin dom ar na huafáis a ċonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.orig: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.html: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ponchtml: Traiḋfil blianta ó ẛin ḃíoṫas ag caint ar ḃreacaḋ ré úr do na meáin ċumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ga: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.orig: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.html: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ mo ċéad ċuairt ar Ṁeiriceá i gcuiṁne dom blianta fada ó ẛinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
